Posts.Content: I am a 31 year old mom of 4 kids,been married 6 years.I never thought that This would be happening to me.I had a mamo And ultrasaound last week that did not detect anything,so I thought I was in the clear till dr.young calls to tell me they do see somethong and I need to see a breast surgeon on the 24th,fir a needle biopsy.I am so scared.Things like this dont happen to young healthy women like me!!!Let me paint you a picture...Im 5.4...110...15% body fat...In really great shape.I guess we are all at risk!!!Im so scared that Its going to be cancer I think about it all day everyday. dont want to leave my kids and husband...has anyone gone thrue this?Im sure alot of you all are right now.how do you just get tru the day with out picturing your self NOT in it...or cry all day. I need depression help especailly if I receive bad news after the biopsy heather
Posts.Title: seeing a breast surgeon for a needle biopsy

Posts.Content: On 12/21/2008 KayleighGrace wrote: Last March 2008 I was facing the same thing.  I was also scared.  It is very important not too use too much negative energy projecting past today.  You can get extremly anxious, loose a lot of sleep, and exhaust yourself.  I have talked to many people who have had a negative biopsy.  Unfortunatly I was not one of them.  My cancer was caught early and on December 30, 2008 I will recieve my last radiation treatment after five months of chemo and surgery.  I will still take Herceptin until July 2009.  This has been a journey for me and my family.  I have learned so much about breast cancer and met tons of wonderful people.  I truly believe God has been with me from the begining and is leading me toward a better life.  Instead of letting those thoughts suck out your energy concentrate on today and how wonderful and lucky we are.  See things as brighter, warmer, kinder and amazing.  Times like this are meant for us to learn and grow.  No matter what your diagnosis is this time in your life God will grant you wisdom that you didn't have before.  I will keep you in my prayers Heather.  Please let us know how you are doing, ok? Deb Deb- Thank you for all your kind words and I hope all is well with you and your family.My results are negitive...thank god.I hope everything goes ass well for you in the future and you are a pure insperation to women like me. heather
Posts.Title: seeing a breast surgeon for a needle biopsy

Posts.Content: tre- again thank you so much for your support.Thank the lord all is ok.I have a great doctor and hospital so I was able to find out all I needed to yesterday.I have to see the breast surgeon in 2 monthes for a check up.I appreciate life,my husband ans especailly my kids more.thank you again. heather
